name: Corrupted Unicorn
description: The Corrupted Unicorn is a large celestial creature known for its elegance and dark power, twisted by malevolent influences, featuring a horn and hooves that deal significant damage.
memorable: Its ability to shroud the battlefield in magical darkness while providing healing and boons makes it uniquely powerful and tactical.
goals: To defend its territory while offering aid to allies, potentially corrupted by dark influences.
relations: May be related to other corrupted creatures or dark entities.
environment: Often found in dark forests or corrupted magical areas.
strengths: Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against magical effects, making it resilient against spellcasting foes.
weaknesses: Susceptible to bright light due to its corrupted nature; may draw attention from heroic forces looking to cleanse the corruption.
attacks: Strikes with powerful hooves and a piercing horn, capable of inflicting radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Darkness Aura creates an area of magical darkness, allowing it to control the battlefield.
senses: Passive Perception of 15 allows it to detect creatures stealthily.
additional_information: Can inflict extra damage and knock targets prone with its charge.
Grants powerful boons to itself or allies for tactical advantages.
Immune to charmed, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions.
test_queries: elegant celestial unicorn corrupted by darkness
swift magical creature with radiant strikes
elegant horse-like creature that aids allies
